body_html:
@wangsiyu We currently don't support sync mode with ParameterServerStrategy. It is definitely a use case that we want to support in the future but we are not actively working on it. We want to explore other solutions that don't depend on SyncReplicaOptimizer going forward.

Does the CollectiveAllReduceStrategy not work for your use case? What issues do you run into?
